copyrightManager.copyrightText.description: Copyright Text That You Want to Add In Each File

copyrightManager.copyrightTemplate.description: Template for the copyright text. Use placeholders: {{fileName}}, {{purpose}}, {{developerName}}, {{creationDate}}, {{auditLog}}, {{organizationName}}, {{copyrightText}}

copyrightManager.enableAuditHistory.description: Enable adding audit (maintenance history) entries to existing files

copyrightManager.filePattern.description: Regex pattern to match file extensions for processing

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
